attributes.action: Pave  the  Way  for  Maitreya's  Emergence  today.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For  all  who  stand  for  inclusiveness  and  love, justice  and  freedom  of  the  human  spirit

               

Yes  I  know  and  understand  what  Maitreya  is  ready  to  stand  for.

His  main  teachings  can  be  summarized  as  “Share  and  Save  the  World”. In  sharing  we  will  create  justice. When  there  is  justice, there  will  be  peace. When  there  is  peace, then  shall  form  right  relationships  all  over  the  world.

I  agree  to  back  the  calls  for  a  more  cleaner, just  and  safer  world  for  all  and  in  so  doing  pave  the  way  for  Maitreya’s  full, open  emergence  in  our  world  today.

It  really  is  not  a  matter  of  accepting  or  rejecting  Him. Rather  I  am  willing  to  offer  Maitreya  an  opportunity  to  show  us  humanity  how  we  can  make  this  world  a  much  better  place. 

At  the  end  of  the  day, humanity  is  one  word.



PLEASE SIGN THE PETITION.

THANK  YOU.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
